metadata.Title: CVE-2015-0569 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Heap-based buffer overflow in the private wireless extensions IOCTLimplementation in wlan_hdd_wext.c in the WLAN (aka Wi-Fi) driver for theLinux kernel 3.x and 4.x, as used in Qualcomm Innovation Center (QuIC)Android contributions for MSM devices and other products, allows attackersto gain privileges via a crafted application that establishes a packetfilter.

criterions.comment: linux-goldfish: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
